alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Greene; Jersey (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:48PM CDT until April 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Illinois River at Hardin. Illinois River at La Grange Lock and Dam. Illinois River at Meredosia. Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Hardin. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to remain near flood stage over the 24 hours before falling back below flood stage once again. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Illinois River Hardin 25.0 25.0 Thu 8 pm 25.0 24.9 24.8 24.6 24.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
